DescriptionFormatTextId.SourceString: When you deal damage to an enemy, crush their armor, reducing their <PhysicalReduction># by [0]%</> for <Duration>[0] seconds</>. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
DescriptionFormatTextId.LocalizedString: When you deal damage to an enemy, crush their armor, reducing their <PhysicalReduction>_ by [0]%</> for <Duration>[0] seconds</>. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
